word: G2398 - ἴδιος - ídios - id'-ee-os - His acquaintance

sections.paragraph: தம்முடைய, தன்னுடைய, சொந்த, அதனதனுடைய, சுய - பெயரடை

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Of uncertain affinity; pertaining to self, that is, one's own; by implication private or separate: - X his acquaintance, when they were alone, apart, aside, due, his (own, proper, several), home, (her, our, thine, your) own (business), private (-ly), proper, severally, their (own).
